heading: Look at Gaming #92
special_insights:
powered by AppMagic.rocks üòé
Did you know that Nintendo's mobile publishing business has $1.4B in lifetime rev with 676M downloads.  Surprisingly, this is a low number (not counting Pokemon GO!).
That's why Nintendo is partnering up with DeNA, a large mobile publisher with $$2.4B in lifetime rev but only 127M downloads.  Clearly, DeNA monetizes their users nearly 9x better than Nintendo does.
My Dashboard (Warning Paywall'd but I gave the TLDR above. If you have AppMagic, check out my view!): https://appmagic.rocks/dashboards/636b19dd7773c
